name: Super Hurt
description:
Your prime goal is to kill all enemies having limited number of bullets in your gun.

The key feature is realistic physics in the game.

You need to think about ricochet, collisions, buttons, doors, ropes, pillars, portals, etc.

Weapons of choice: pistol, portal gun.

Trigger button is used for shooting, grip for laser aim, teleport for changing weapon.

Please leave your feedback below on would you love the game, what you want to change/improve. Appreciate your feedback.
